content: juniper sun headband sizes needles adult s/m one 16 40 cm circular needle size us 3 3 25 mm yarn farmer s daughter fibers bear paw sock 80% gauge superwash merino 20% yak 10% nylon 27 stitches & 38 row = 4 10 cm stockinette 1 mini skein each mc c1 c2 c3 c4 stitch or approx additional tools fingering weight yarn stitch marker tapestry needle blocking 87 yds 80 m mc materials 20 yds 18 m c1 c2 c3 c4 finished measurements sample colorways height 4 ½ 11 5 cm mc sunny s circumference 19 ½ 49 5 cm c1 fugitive the headband circumference is designed with c2 witchy woman ½-1 1-2 cm negative ease c3 i ve got dreams to remember c4 york 2 pattern with mc co 156 sts join for working in the round and put marker for beginning of round work in 1x1 rib for 4 row knit 1 row work row 1-32 of the juniper sun chart repeating the chart 3 times each round switch to mc knit 1 row work in 1x1 rib for 3 row bobble in rib cut the yarn leaving a tail finishing weave in ends and wet block to prevent edges from rolling abbreviations 1x1 rib k1 p1 to end approx approximately bobble bind off c color co cast on mc main color s/m small/medium sts stitches 3 juniper sun chart
